footer.description: Specialist in high-quality aluminum verandas and patio covers. Your reliable partner for outdoor living for more than 15 years.

hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: Your partner for high-quality patio solutions

who.title: Who are we?
who.description1: We are a leading company specializing in providing stylish and durable patio solutions. We are proud to offer a wide range of high-quality products, including verandas, glass sliding walls and side walls, to transform your outdoor space into an oasis of comfort and beauty.
who.description2: Don't hesitate any longer and contact us today to request your quote. Together we will make your outdoor space a place where you can fully enjoy, regardless of the weather!

quality.title: Quality and craftsmanship
quality.description1: At Alusolutions, we attach great value to quality and craftsmanship. Our products are manufactured with high-quality materials and innovative technologies, resulting in durable and reliable solutions. Our dedicated and experienced team members are always ready to advise and guide you in making the best choices for your specific situation.
quality.description2: We strive for customer satisfaction and take on every challenge with enthusiasm. From the first contact to installation and aftercare, we strive to provide excellent service and build a long-term relationship with our customers.

banner.title: Discover our timeless and elegant patio solutions
banner.description: Make your outdoor space shine with our stylish verandas and glass sliding walls, which add a timeless and elegant appearance to your home.

custom.title: Custom patio solutions
custom.description: At Alusolutions we believe in customization. We design and create patio solutions that perfectly match your specific wishes, so you can enjoy an outdoor space that is completely yours.

experience.title: Improve your outdoor experience
experience.description: Our high-quality patio solutions enhance your outdoor experience, so you can enjoy outdoor living in all seasons to the fullest.

protection.title: Comfort and protection
protection.description: Our patio solutions not only provide comfort, but also protect you from weather and wind, so you can enjoy your outdoor space without worries.

oasis.title: Create Your Outdoor Oasis
oasis.description: At Alusolutions we strive to transform your outdoor space into an oasis of comfort, style and elegance. With custom patio solutions and high-quality products, we make your dream project a reality. Request a quote today and discover the possibilities for your unique outdoor environment.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: Only the best materials and craftsmanship

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.description: Contact us today for a no-obligation quote

hero.title: Polycarbonate veranda
hero.description1: A polycarbonate veranda is the ideal choice for those looking for a durable and affordable patio cover. Thanks to the strong and clear polycarbonate roof panels, you enjoy plenty of light, without sacrificing protection from rain and wind.
hero.description2: At AluSolutions, we deliver your polycarbonate veranda completely tailored to your needs. Within 3 weeks, our veranda builders ensure fast delivery and professional installation.

benefits.title: Experience the unique benefits of a polycarbonate veranda
benefits.subtitle: Affordable elegance with our polycarbonate verandas
benefits.paragraph1: The investment in a polycarbonate veranda depends on several factors, such as the dimensions of the construction and the choice of additional options such as built-in LED spots, side walls or sliding doors.
benefits.paragraph2: We understand that choosing a veranda is an important decision that must be tailored to both your budget and your lifestyle. That's why we offer personal advice and detailed information about the possibilities and costs.

quality.title: Affordable quality polycarbonate verandas
quality.description: The cost of a polycarbonate veranda depends on the size and extras such as spotlights, side walls or sliding doors. Yet such a veranda is an economical choice that lasts a long time and looks beautiful.
quality.feature1: Material costs: cheaper than glass, economically advantageous
quality.feature2: Lower installation costs: simple installation reduces labor costs
quality.feature3: Durability and maintenance: long-lasting with minimal maintenance
quality.feature4: Energy efficiency: insulation reduces energy costs

what.title: What is a polycarbonate veranda?
what.description: A polycarbonate veranda from Alusolutions is a durable patio or garden cover that extends your home with a stylish outdoor space.

benefits.title: Benefits of polycarbonate
benefits.description: Polycarbonate is a robust, light-permeable material that provides protection against UV rays and weather influences.

whyUs.title: Why choose Alusolutions?
whyUs.description: At Alusolutions you choose quality and durability. Our verandas are strong and low-maintenance.

personalize.title: Personalize your veranda
personalize.description: Every veranda can be personalized with options such as LED lighting, sun protection and side walls.

installation.title: Placement and installation
installation.description: Our experts ensure fast and professional installation of your veranda.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Discover our easy step-by-step guide for your polycarbonate veranda.

q1.question: Is a permit required to install a patio cover?
q1.answer: In most cases no permit is required if the cover meets certain conditions. Contact us for advice on permits in your municipality.

q2.question: How long does a patio cover last?
q2.answer: Our verandas last for years with minimal maintenance. With proper care you can count on a lifespan of 20+ years.

q3.question: Are your patio covers resistant to all weather conditions?
q3.answer: Yes, our products are designed for the Dutch climate and resistant to rain, wind, snow and UV radiation.

q4.question: How long does it take to install a patio cover?
q4.answer: Within 3 weeks we ensure delivery and professional installation. The installation itself usually takes 1-2 days.

q5.question: Can I expand my veranda later with extra options?
q5.answer: Yes, our verandas are modularly designed. You can easily add LED lighting, side walls or sliding doors later.

q6.question: Do you offer financing options?
q6.answer: Yes, we work with various financing partners. Ask about the possibilities during your personal consultation.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.subtitle: Do you have questions or would you like to make an appointment? Please feel free to contact us!

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.content: AluSolutions respects your privacy and ensures that the personal information you provide to us is treated confidentially.

section2.title: 2. Data we collect
section2.content: We collect data that you provide to us, such as name, address, email address and telephone number when you contact us or request a quote.

section3.title: 3. Use of data
section3.content: Your data is used to process your request, send quotes and deliver our services.

section4.title: 4. Retention period
section4.content: We do not keep your data longer than necessary for the purpose for which it was collected.

section5.title: 5. Your rights
section5.content: You have the right to view, correct and delete your data. Please contact us for this.

section6.title: 6. Contact
section6.content: For questions about our privacy policy, you can contact us via info@alusolutions.nl

section1.title: Article 1 - Definitions
section1.content: In these terms AluSolutions means: the company located in Reuver, registered with the Chamber of Commerce under number 90086449.

section2.title: Article 2 - Applicability
section2.content: These conditions apply to all offers and agreements of AluSolutions.

section3.title: Article 3 - Quotes
section3.content: All quotes are non-binding and valid for 30 days, unless otherwise stated.

section4.title: Article 4 - Delivery
section4.content: The delivery time is determined in consultation and is indicative.

section5.title: Article 5 - Warranty
section5.content: AluSolutions offers 10 years warranty on the construction under normal use.

section6.title: Article 6 - Payment
section6.content: Payment is made in accordance with the payment terms stated on the invoice.

section1.title: What are cookies?
section1.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit our website.

section2.title: Which cookies do we use?
section2.functionalDesc: Necessary for the functioning of the website.
section2.analyticalDesc: To gain insight into the use of the website.

section3.title: Managing cookies
section3.content: You can block or delete cookies via your browser settings.

section4.title: Contact
section4.content: Questions about our cookie policy? Contact us via info@alusolutions.nl

cta.title: Make an appointment
cta.subtitle: Plan your visit to our showroom

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Find answers to the most frequently asked questions

q1.question: How long does delivery of a veranda take?
q1.answer: The average delivery time is 3-4 weeks after placing your order. This may vary depending on the type of veranda and any custom options.

q2.question: What does a veranda cost?
q2.answer: The price of a veranda depends on the type, dimensions and chosen options. Request a no-obligation quote for an exact price quote.

q3.question: How long does installation take?
q3.answer: Installation takes an average of 1-2 days, depending on the size and complexity of the veranda.

q4.question: Is there a warranty on the veranda?
q4.answer: Yes, we offer 10 years warranty on the construction and 5 years on moving parts such as motors.

q5.question: Do I need a permit?
q5.answer: In most cases a veranda is permit-free provided it meets certain conditions. We will advise you on this during the consultation.

q6.question: Can I install the veranda myself?
q6.answer: We recommend having the installation carried out by our professionals for optimal results and to maintain warranty.

q7.question: Which colors are available?
q7.answer: Our verandas are available in many standard colors. In addition, any RAL color is possible as a custom option.

q8.question: Can I add lighting and heating?
q8.answer: Yes, we offer various options for built-in LED lighting and patio heating.

q9.question: How do I maintain my veranda?
q9.answer: An aluminum veranda is virtually maintenance-free. Occasional cleaning with water and a soft cloth is sufficient.

q10.question: Do you also come to my area?
q10.answer: We install verandas throughout the Netherlands. Contact us to discuss the possibilities.

info.title: What is a Polycarbonate Veranda?
info.description1: A polycarbonate veranda is the ideal choice for anyone looking for a durable and affordable patio cover. Thanks to the strong and clear polycarbonate roof panels, you enjoy plenty of light without compromising on protection from rain and wind.
info.description2: At AluSolutions, we deliver your polycarbonate veranda completely customized to your needs. Within 3 weeks, our veranda experts ensure fast delivery and professional installation.

specs.title: Specifications
specs.frameColorsValue: Anthracite, white, cream or RAL color

cta.title: Interested in a Polycarbonate Veranda?
cta.description: Request a free quote or make an appointment for personalized advice

info.title: What is a Glass Veranda?
info.description1: A glass veranda offers maximum light entry and an unobstructed view of your garden. Tempered glass is safe, strong and easy to clean.
info.description2: At AluSolutions, we only use high-quality tempered glass that meets all safety standards.

hero.title: Louvered Veranda
hero.subtitle: Adjustable sun protection for optimal comfort

info.title: What is a Louvered Veranda?
info.description1: A louvered veranda offers ultimate flexibility. The rotating louvers allow you to adjust sunlight and ventilation exactly as you wish, from fully open to completely closed.
info.description2: Perfect for those who want maximum control over light and shade throughout the day.

specs.title: Specifications
specs.warrantyValue: 10 years on construction, 5 years on motor

info.title: What is a Folding Roof Veranda?
info.description1: A folding roof veranda combines protection with flexibility. The fabric can be electrically opened and closed, so you decide when you want to sit under the open sky.
info.description2: Ideal for those who want the best of both worlds: protection when needed, open air when desired.

specs.title: Specifications
specs.warrantyValue: 10 years on frame, 5 years on fabric

cta.title: Interested in a Folding Roof Veranda?

info.title: What is a Glass Sliding Wall?
info.description1: A glass sliding wall transforms your veranda into a wind-free outdoor room. The panels slide easily to the side for maximum ventilation.
info.description2: The perfect addition to your existing veranda or canopy.

cta.title: Interested in a Glass Sliding Wall?

hero.title: Cube Veranda
hero.subtitle: Sleek modern design for your garden

info.title: What is a Cube Veranda?
info.description1: The Cube veranda is the pinnacle of modern design. With straight lines and a minimalist appearance, this perfect cube fits into any modern garden.
info.description2: Freestanding or attached to the house, the Cube always makes an impression.

hero.title: Garden Room
hero.subtitle: Enjoy your garden all year round

info.title: What is a Garden Room?
info.description1: A garden room is a fully enclosed veranda where you can enjoy your garden all year round, regardless of the weather.
info.description2: Perfect as extra living space, workspace or hobby room with a garden view.

info.title: What is a Carport?
info.description1: An aluminum carport protects your car from rain, snow, hail and UV rays. Stylish and durable, a valuable addition to your home.
info.description2: Completely custom-made for one or more cars.
